enum GrTextureBase::EFORMAT

possible texture formats. Note that if a new format is added, modifications must be made to _internalFormatMap, in the GrTexture.cpp and GrTextureCube.cpp.

Definition at line 192 of file GrTextureBase.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

void GrTextureBase::AutoGenMipmaps (  ) 

This should be called after rendering to all of the faces of a texture. This way, mipmaps will be automatically generated in hardware. Note that this function will cause the texture to be bound to the actively selected texture unit. Note that the texture cannot be part of a bound framebuffer object at the time of this function call. Also note that mipmapping must be enabled for this texture object.

cannot be called if we're not using mipmaps!

bind the texture and generate the mipmap chain.

Definition at line 392 of file GrTextureBase.cpp.

unsigned int GrTextureBase::GetGLHandle (  )  const [inline]

This is provided in case the OpenGL texture handle is desired. Use of this function is not recommended. Straight OpenGL function calls are prohibited in the engine except for in the driver, and this funcion will not be available on all platforms (Win32/Linux/Mac only).
